page.title: 09LOCAL NEWS (W/E 7.7.85)
page.content: There are three local newspapers that serve the area. {1)THE LINCOLNSHIRE ECHO {2)THE SLEAFORD STANDARD {3)THE TARGET During the week ending 7.7.85 the stories detailed in each paper were: 1)From the{ECHO}the main story about the area was that the local Brownies were helping to tidy up the small stream that is called"THE BECK". 2)From the{STANDARD}the main story was of the local junior football team and their A.G.M. The parish council also had their recent meeting reported. 3)From the{TARGET}the main story was of a lady who committed suicide.
